title: Touro Synagogue National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons           2015 Operating Hours  January, February, March and April   Sundays Only Visitors Center: 11:30 - 2:30  Synagogue tours: 12:00, 12:30, 1:00, 1:30    Special Passover hours: April 6 - April 9 hours as stated above  PLEASE NOTE: IN THE EVENT OF A MAJOR SNOW STORM, TOURS MAY BE CANCELLED.   May 3 - June 26   Sunday - Friday  Visitors Center: 11:30 - 2:30  Synagogue tours: 12:00, 12:30, 1:00, 1:30    Jewish holiday/no tours May 24 and 25   June 28 - September 6   Sunday - Friday Visitors Center: 9:30 - 4:30  Synagogue tours: 10:00 - 3:30   September 7 - October 30   Sunday - Friday Visitors Center: 9:30 - 2:30  Synagogue tours: 10:00 - 1:30 Jewish holidays/no tours Sept. 14, 15, 23, 28, 29 and Oct. 5 and 6  November 1 - December 31   Sundays Only  Visitors Center: 11:30 - 2:30  Synagogue tours: 12:00, 12:30, 1:00, 1:30     Please check the website: http://www.tourosynagogue.org for services times.
